Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Price: $16.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:45:29 UTC – Details)


There’s been a murder, and you and your friends must work together to solve it! In this fully cooperative social deduction game, players use their cards to determine who holds the Murderer card in their hand. Action and Effect Cards give players clues, but be careful – if you can’t work together, the Murderer will escape your discovery! For 3-8 players, ages 14 and up.
Work together as detectives to bring the Murderer to justice!
Easy-to learn social deduction game that’s different each time you play it
Players use the unique effects of their cards to discover and communicate who they think is holding the Murderer card
Don’t let the Murderer escape or everyone loses!
Recommended for 3-8 players, ages 14 and up

Pressman There’s Been a Murder Game, Ages 14 and Up, 3-8 Players

Easy-to-learn, collaborative card game

There’s been a murder, and you and your friends must work together to solve it! Game includes 9 Effect Cards, 15 Action Cards, 1 Reference Guide and Complete Instructions.

Use strategy and teamwork to find the Murderer!

Players use the Action and Effect Cards and follow the prompts to find clues and try to discover who holds the Murderer card. Strategize together or the Murderer may escape justice!

Cracking the case for the win!

If you play the Detective card and force the Murderer card to be discarded, or if the Murderer and Informant cards end up in one player’s hand, you win the game! Score your game based on how many cards are left in the deck. Play again and see if you can improve your ranking on the scoring chart!







There’s Been a Murder
Wheel of Fortune Game: 5th Edition
Your Worst Nightmare
The Escape Game: Escape from Iron Gate
SEQUENCE
Description In this fully cooperative social deduction game, players use their cards to determine who holds the Murderer card. Action and Effect Cards give players clues, but be careful – if you can’t work together, the Murderer will escape your discovery! Bring the fun of the most popular game show in history to your next game night! This 5th edition features 100 brand new puzzles from the beloved show, all written by the Wheel of Fortune staff, as well as the classic puzzle board and wheel. It’s time to face your fears – and the world’s scariest nightmares! Players deal four Fear Cards and rank them on their Scare Cards, from blood-curdling to no big deal. Earn the most points by guessing how your fellow players will rank them and win! You have been wrongfully accused of a crime. Escape Iron Gate Prison by moving through each of the four areas on the board, earning items on the way by completing puzzles, drawing, acting and trading. Pass through the final gate first to win! Play a card from your hand, and place a chip on a corresponding space on the game board. When you have five in a row, it’s a SEQUENCE. Block your opponents or remove their chips. The first player or team with the required number of SEQUENCES wins!
Minimum Age 14+ 8+ 12+ 13+ 7+
Minimum Players 3 2 2 3 2
Maximum Players 8 4 4 8 12

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:45:29 UTC – Details)

item.title: 303 Automotive Protectant – Provides Superior UV Protection, Helps Prevent Fading and Cracking, Repels Dust, Lint, and Staining, Restores Lost Color and Luster, 16oz (30382CSR) Packaging May Vary

item.description: Technical Details Manufacturer ‎Gold Eagle Co. Brand ‎303 Products Model ‎30382 Item Weight ‎1 pounds Product Dimensions ‎3.9 x 1.8 x 11 inches Country of Origin ‎USA Item model number ‎30382CSR Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‎No Manufacturer Part Number ‎30382CSR Special Features ‎DIRECTIONS – Use only on clean surfaces. Spray surface with product and wipe ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Technical Details

Manufacturer ‎Gold Eagle Co.
Brand ‎303 Products
Model ‎30382
Item Weight ‎1 pounds
Product Dimensions ‎3.9 x 1.8 x 11 inches
Country of Origin ‎USA
Item model number ‎30382CSR
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‎No
Manufacturer Part Number ‎30382CSR
Special Features ‎DIRECTIONS – Use only on clean surfaces. Spray surface with product and wipe completely dry with a clean, dry microfiber towel. Product can also be applied directly onto microfiber applicator or towel. If streaking occurs, too much product has been used. Use a wet towel to remove excess, and immediately wipe completely dry. Note: This product does not air dry. Do not use on unfinished leathers (such as suede), fabrics (canvas), flooring, clear plastic, gauge panels, or headlights., NON-GREASY – This restoration product dries to a smooth, matte finish with no oily or greasy residue. When treating the rubber, vinyl, and plastic surfaces of your vehicle, trust 303 Automotive Protectant to keep your prized possession looking like new., ULTIMATE PROTECTION – 303 Automotive Protectant provides superior protection against the sun’s damaging UV rays. This protector spray repels dust, lint, and staining while also helping to prevent fading and cracking, to keep surfaces looking newer, longer., VERSATILE – This multi-purpose detailing spray restores and maintains a like-new appearance, texture, and color on a variety of surfaces including vinyl, plastic, synthetic and natural rubber, PVC, metal, gel coat, fiberglass, stainless steel, and more. Apply every 3 – 5 weeks for maximum UV protection., SHELF LIFE – All 303 Products are good for use up to 2 years from the bottle fill date which can be found as a Julian Date being a 5-digit number on the back of the bottle and is read as YYDDD. YY indicates the last two digits of the year of production, and DDD represents the number of the day of that year of production. Proudly made in the USA by a family-owned company in Chicago, Illinois.

Additional Information

ASIN B0185PU38A
Customer Reviews

4.7 out of 5 stars

13,191 ratings

4.7 out of 5 stars

Best Sellers Rank #910 in Automotive (See Top 100 in Automotive)
#3 in Automotive Tire Care
#5 in Automotive Upholstery Care Products
#7 in Automotive Protectant Care Products
Date First Available November 18, 2015

Price: $15.99 - $14.88
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:39:29 UTC – Details)


Originally engineered for aerospace and aviation applications, 303 Automotive Protectant provides superior UV protection for any rubber, vinyl, and plastic surfaces of your vehicle, such as your dashboard, windshield wiper blades, and even your tires. Unlike many protectants that leave greasy residues, 303 Automotive Protectant dries to a clear matte finish without that sticky, shiny slick feeling.303 Automotive Protectant not only protects against fading, discoloration and cracking from harmful UV rays, but repels dust and stains, too. Simply spray on and wipe dry for a beautiful, matte finish. Best of all, each application will last up to 30-45 days.Great for use on a variety of surfaces such as: vinyl, plastics, synthetic & natural rubber, leather, PVC, gel coat & fiberglass. Ideal for use on your dashboard, other vinyl/leather interior surfaces of your car, tires, windshield wiper blades and more! Not for use on unfinished leathers (such as suede), fabrics (canvas), floorings, clear plastics, gauge panels, or headlights.
Brightens Surfaces And Keeps Your Car Looking Newer, Longer. This Formula Provides Superior Uv Protection For Any Rubber, Plastic, Vinyl, Eisenglass, Pvc, Gel Coat & Fiberglass Surfaces Of Your Vehicle, Such As Your Dashboard, Windshield Wiper Blades, And Even Your Tires. Not For Use On Unfinished Leathers (Such As Suede), Fabrics (Canvas) Or Floorings.
Uv Protection Against Fading, Discoloration And Cracking From Harmful Uv Rays.
Rinse-Free Formula Leaves A Non-Greasy, Dry Matte Finish With No Odor And Is Non Toxic And Water Based. 100% Free Of Grease-Producing Silicone Oils And Petroleum Distillates.
Easy To Use Spray On Formula That Comes In A 16 Fl. Oz. Bottle With Trigger Sprayer.

Read more

303 Automotive Protectant – 16oz (30382CSR)

Read more

303 Automotive Protectant – 16oz (30382CSR)

How to Use:

  • Make sure surface is clean and dry before using.
  • Spray product directly onto surface, or spray onto microfiber towel to apply.
  • Wipe dry with a clean, dry microfiber towel. Use a wet towel to remove any excess.
  • Evaluate your results. Extra buffing may be required for optimal results.

Description

Description

Originally engineered for aerospace and aviation applications, 303 Automotive Protectant provides superior UV protection for any rubber, vinyl, and plastic surfaces of your vehicle, such as your dashboard, windshield wiper blades, and even your tires. Unlike many protectants that leave greasy residues, 303 Automotive Protectant dries to a clear matte finish without that sticky, shiny slick feeling.

About 303 Products

When you love something, it shows. That’s why avid boaters, car enthusiasts and homeowners have turned to 303 protectants and cleaners for over 35 years. Because we know what that love entails: Slightly obsessive standards, meticulous attention to detail and an unwavering desire for time to stand still and let perfection last just a little longer.

Read more

Read more

It’s fun, it’s challenging, it’s exciting, it’s SEQUENCE! Play a card from your hand, and place a chip on a corresponding space on the game board. When you have five in a row, it’s a SEQUENCE. Learn to block your opponents or remove their chips, and watch out for the Jacks – they’re wild! With a little strategy and luck, you’ll be a winner. Includes 1 Folding Game Board, 2 Decks of SEQUENCE Playing Cards, 135 playing chips: 35 red, 50 blue and 50 green, and Complete Instructions For 2-12 players, ages 7 and up.
Play a card from your hand, and place a chip on a corresponding space on the game board – when you have five in a row, it’s a SEQUENCE
Each player or team tries to score the required number of five-card SEQUENCES before their opponents
Easy enough for children, challenging for adults!
Exciting gameplay develops STEM skills like strategy
Includes 1 Folding Game Board, 2 Decks of SEQUENCE Playing Cards, 135 Playing Chips (50 Green, 50 Blue, 35 Red), and Complete Instructions
For 2-12 players, ages 7 and up

SEQUENCE Contents:

Folding Game Board, 2 Decks of SEQUENCE Playing Cards, 135 Playing Chips, Complete Instructions

SEQUENCE by Goliath

Ages 7 and up, 2-12 players

It’s fun, it’s challenging, it’s exciting, it’s SEQUENCE! Play a card from your hand, and place a chip on a corresponding space on the game board. When you have five in a row, it’s a SEQUENCE. Learn to block your opponents or remove their chips, and watch out for the Jacks – they’re wild! With a little strategy and luck, you’ll be a winner.

  • This exciting game of strategy is fun for the whole family
  • Great for individual or team play
  • Easy enough for kids and challenging enough for adults

Read more

Playing with SEQUENCE

Develops STEM skills like strategy

Players select a card of their choice from their hand and place it face up on a discard pile. Then they place a chip on the corresponding space on the board. Each card is pictured twice on the game board, so choose your space wisely!

Jacks add excitement to gameplay!

Jacks with two eyes are wild and can be used to place a chip on any space on the board. A one-eyed Jack can be played to remove an opponent’s chip from the board. Keep in mind, you cannot remove a chip from a completed SEQUENCE.

Winning the game

The first player or team to score the required number of five-card SEQUENCES wins the game. It’s fun, it’s challenging, it’s exciting – it’s SEQUENCE!

Read more




SEQUENCE
Jumbo SEQUENCE Tube Game
SEQUENCE for Kids
SEQUENCE Letters
SEQUENCE Dice Game
Description Play a card from your hand, and place a chip on a corresponding space on the game board. When you have five in a row, it’s a SEQUENCE. Block your opponents or remove their chips. The first player or team with the required number of SEQUENCES wins! It’s the classic game of SEQUENCE jumbo-sized! The game includes a 32″ x 27″ durable cushioned playing mat which provides easy viewing that’s perfect for large groups and parties! The tube offers convenient storage for future gameplay. It’s the exciting game of SEQUENCE just for kids! Play an animal card from your hand, and place your chip on the corresponding animal on the board. The first player with four chips in a row wins! Reading is not required to play. Players sound out the letter on their cards, match it to the beginning sound of a picture on the game board, then place a chip there. Colored squares on the cards and game board help with faster letter recognition. Get 4 in a row for a SEQUENCE to win! It’s the strategic game of SEQUENCE as an easy to play dice game! Roll the dice and place a chip on a corresponding number on the game board. Get 5 chips in a row and you win! The dice add a fun twist to the game that your whole family will enjoy!
Minimum Age 7+ 7+ 3+ 4+ 7+
Minimum Players 2 2 2 2 2
Maximum Players 12 12 4 4 4
